description: Here's another new guy on Maskurbate, first timer Nelson. This young guy studies Entomology and also is a part time trainer at a local gym (that's where we found him). When asked about the most unusual place he had sex, Nelson answered he had sex with 3 girls... in a cemetery! The girls were co-students, they were there for a school project and it just happened! He describes himself as an honest & persevering guy who works hard. He has an intriguing tattoo stating 'There's no comfort in the truth, Pain is all you'll find'. I guess there's a dark side to everyone, nevertheless he was a real cool guy to meet and work with.
title: Nelson, Scene #01
